section.heading: Officers and employees; personnel system; compensation; benefits.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 108 of Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-586, November 1, 2004, 51 DCR 10681).
Resolution 16-212, the “Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Operating Documents Approval Resolution of 2005”, was approved effective June 21, 2005.
